comment: Two plus two equals four. For more information, see "2+2=4 Trivia" on the Metamath Proof Explorer Home Page: ~ mmset.html#trivia . This proof is simple, but it depends on many other proof steps because 2 and 4 are complex numbers and thus it depends on our construction of complex numbers. The proof ~ o2p2e4 is similar but proves ` 2 + 2 = 4 ` using ordinal natural numbers (finite integers starting at 0), so that proof depends on fewer intermediate steps. (Contributed by NM, 27-May-1999.)
